title: NCOC launches Covid-19 vaccination app
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP):National Command and Operation Center (NCOC) in collaboration with NADRA has launched ‘Pak COVID-19 Vaccination Pass App’.
NCOC in collaboration with NADRA (@NadraMedia) has launched Pak COVID-19 Vaccination Pass App, a digital wallet for COVID-19 vaccination certificate pic.twitter.com/htb2KsQPR4
— NCOC (@OfficialNcoc) August 14, 2021
NCOC in a Tweet said that the vaccination app a digital wallet will be used for COVID-19 vaccination certificate.
